pages.text:
.entry-header
Our Story
THE RESTAURANT
At Grillers Puerto Rico, we bring the soul of Puerto Rican cuisine to life by combining traditional flavors with a modern twist. Our passion for authentic food drives us to serve the freshest, highest-quality ingredients, from local meats to seafood, all prepared with the love and expertise of our talented chefs.
Our menu is a celebration of Puerto Rico’s rich culinary heritage, featuring classic dishes like mofongo, Kan Kan pork chops, and fresh seafood, as well as innovative creations that highlight the island’s unique flavors.
We take pride in offering an experience that feels like home, with each plate crafted to evoke the vibrant culture, warmth, and spirit of Puerto Rico. Whether you’re craving a taste of the island or looking to explore new dishes with a familiar touch, Grillers Puerto Rico is the place to indulge in the true essence of Boricua cuisine.
We take pride in offering an experience that feels like home, with each plate crafted to evoke the vibrant culture, warmth, and spirit of Puerto Rico. Whether you’re craving a taste of the island or looking to explore new dishes with a familiar touch, Grillers Puerto Rico is the place to indulge in the true essence of Boricua cuisine.
Meet #ChefJoseAntonio
Jose Antonio Martin Grau, in the kitchen for over 25 years, Chef Jose Antonio is the creator of Grillers.
“The reality of being a business owner or leader is often far from the glamorous perception. It involves long hours, financial sacrifices, and taking responsibility when things go wrong – even when you’re not credited for successes. But the drive to prove oneself and belief in one’s own abilities are what motivate many to take on the challenges of entrepreneurship.”
Honrado y agradecido con
iHeartMedia
por el premio de
The Most Influential Person 2024.
.entry-content .clear
#post-##

At Grillers, we believe in celebrating Latin flavors, culture, and community.
We’re more than just a restaurant—we’re a family.
If you’re ready to bring your passion for Latin food and hospitality to our team, we’d love to hear from you! Please submit your Resume
here
, and let’s create memorable dining experiences together.
